mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INSTRUCTIONS( LOT_NUM, PROD_ID, INST_AMT, PROD_AMT, INST_DATE, PROD_DATE, EMP_ID) VALUES( inst_seq.nextval, #{prodId}, #{instAmt}, #{prodAmt}, #{instDate}, #{prodDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empId})

INSERT INTO PRODUCTION( LOT_NUM, PROD_ID, INST_AMT, PROD_AMT, INST_DATE, PROD_DATE, EMP_ID) VALUES( manu_seq.nextval, #{prodId}, #{instAmt}, #{prodAmt}, #{instDate}, #{prodDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empId})
mapper.select: SELECT I.LOT_NUM, (SELECT P1.PROD_NAME FROM PRODUCT P1 WHERE P1.PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID) AS PROD_NAME, I.INST_AMT, I.PROD_AMT, TO_CHAR(I.INST_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS INST_DATE, TO_CHAR(I.PROD_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS PROD_DATE, (SELECT E1.EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE_TEST E1 WHERE E1.EMP_ID = I.EMP_ID) AS EMP_NAME, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT M.LOT_NUM FROM PRODUCTION M WHERE M.LOT_NUM = I.LOT_NUM) THEN '미완료' ELSE '완료' END AS COMPLETION FROM INSTRUCTIONS I ORDER BY I.LOT_NUM DESC
